import React, { useState } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; uuidv4(); export const Formulario = ({addItem, filterText}) => { const [value, setValue] = useState("") const [num, setNum] = useState(1) const [category, setCategory] = useState("Otro") const [filtertext, setFiltertext] = use const handleChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let cosa = { id:uuidv4(), category: category, cantidad: num, stocked: true, name: value } addItem(cosa) setValue("") } return (
setValue(e.target.value)} />
setNum(e.target.value)} />

) }
